actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to adjust loan levels established under the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973, as amended, for the 1974 through 1977 crops of wheat and feed grains to reflect changes in farm production costs.

summary.text: Provides for the adjustment of loan levels established under the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973, as amended, for the 1974 through 1977 crops of wheat, corn, and feed grains to reflect changes in farm production costs.

titles.title: A bill to adjust loan levels established under the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973, as amended, for the 1974 through 1977 crops of wheat and feed grains to reflect changes in farm production costs.
